name: How can I call you?
What is your name?
Who are you?
FROM: I have hard time guessing your home country. What is it?
Which town do you call your home?
HAS_HOBBY: What is your favorite thing to do?
What do you do in your free time?
How do you spend your free time?
What is your favorite pastime activity?
LIVE_IN: Which city do you live in?
FRIEND_OF: Have I met any of your friends?
Do you have a friend whom I have met?
Maybe I know some friends of yours. Would you name one?
STUDY_AT: Which university do you go to?
Which university do you study at?
MEMBER_OF: Are you a member of some cool organization?
Do you belong to any organizations?
WORK_FOR: For which company do you work?
Which organization do you work at?
Where do you earn your living?
movies: What was the last movie you saw in the cinema?
What is your favorite TV show?
Which comedy do you like the most?
OCCUPATION: What is your field of expertise?
